group_1.textRight: You all right?
No problem at all. We've got to look out for@one another!
I'm Yu. I've forgotten my last name.
Call me Yu.
If you're with Kyubey, does that mean you're@a Magical Girl, too?
Ah, okay.

group_1.textLeft: U-um, if I become a Magical Girl, will you@be my teacher?
I'd like you to teach me, Yu!

group_1.textRight: [chara:802200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What? M-me?!
Listen, Nagisa... You should be more careful@about—

group_1.textLeft: Not now, Kyubey. I'm asking Yu for a favor.

group_1.textRight: Oh, wow.
I became a Magical Girl pretty late.
I'm not as experienced as I look.
It might be better if you ask someone else.
What is it you want to know, Nagisa? Is it@about Witches? Magic?

group_1.textLeft: I don't understand why I have the potential@to become a Magical Girl...
I don't know if I really can.
I'm not good at anything, and I haven't@done anything special.
I don't even know what I should wish for.
Yu, why did you become a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: [chara:802200:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Urrrgh, well...
I actually can't recall who I was before I@became a Magical Girl.
I also don't remember why I became one.
I can't even tell who's good or bad.
I need a list to keep track of who's a good@guy and who's a bad guy.
I'm totally unqualified to teach anyone@anything...
[chara:802200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh! I forgot to ask!
Your last name! What's your last name?
I see, I see. Nagisa Momoe.
Nagisa Momoe... [chara:802200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:802200:lipSynch_1]Okay.
You're not on my list, so you must be a@good guy.
Yeah.
This list only has bad guys on it.
It has a bunch of names of bad guys who live@in this area, actually.
Since you're not on it, Nagisa, you must be@a good guy!
You are.
I'm going around killing the bad guys whose@names are on my list.
Since you're a good guy, Nagisa, I won't@kill you.
Oh, "Nagisa" Momoe isn't on my list.
But actually, there's someone on it with the@same last name.
See? This name here.
Do you know this person?
I went to her house earlier.
But nobody was home.
None of the lights were on, and the inside@of the house was covered in trash.

group_1.textLeft: Did that person...do something to make you@angry?

group_1.textRight: Nope, I've never even met her.
I've got no beef with her, but I don't know,@maybe someone else has a thing against her?
Let's see, this person...
She's abusing someone? Or something?
Yeah.
I don't know the details.
But if they're on my list, they're bad!

group_1.textLeft: I...don't know who that person is.
They probably moved somewhere far away.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... You really think so? Maybe they did.

group_1.textLeft: B-but...why do you want to kill them?

group_1.textRight: You know...
I don't remember who I was before I became a@Magical Girl.
But I have the feeling I made an important@promise...
I think I might be able to remember it if I@do my job.
So, I'm fulfilling my duties as a Magical@Girl with that hope.
That's why I'm going around killing Witches@and bad guys.

group_1.textLeft: I-I thought Magical Girls only had to defeat@Witches...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's right. I hunt Witches, too.
They're different? Really?
Oh! Are you worried about me?
Don't worry, it'll be fine!
I won't accidentally kill any good guys!
I always make sure to check that I'm killing@the right person!
Oh, I'm also environmentally friendly.
I sell the usable parts of the corpses before@I dispose of them in a Labyrinth.
So, it all works out.

group_1.textLeft: Nagisa, you don't have to listen to her@anymore.
We do not recommend murdering people.

group_1.textRight: Aww, come on!
Don't be such an alien, Kyubey!
Nagisa!
I may not understand the complicated stuff.
But I can use magic now, and I never know@when I might end up dying in a ditch.
So I decided to be honest with myself about@what I want to do with my life.
You should do the same if you become a@Magical Girl.
It's okay to stop tolerating everything.
Yeah.
Just be free! Like, FREEDOM!
I only just met you, but you seem like you're@really well put together.
Maybe you just have a lot on your shoulders,@tons of things to worry about.
I think that's probably why you're asking @someone you just met all these questions.
I'm in no position to tell others what to do.
But I'm putting my life on the line by@fighting bad guys.
And I've been given these extraordinary@magic powers.
I think I should do what I want, you know?
Holding back is too much work, and freedom@is important!

group_1.textLeft: What would happen if every Magical Girl@turned out to be like you?
I imagine humankind would be destroyed in@the blink of an eye.

group_1.textRight: Shut up, alien!
Anyway, I better go.
See you around.
I can't be your teacher.
But let me know if you ever need any help@from me!
I hope you find a good Magical Girl mentor!
Hm?
Huh? Nah, I doubt it.
